tZOJXKqONLmhdobcz.notes: Usable once per hour of play
tZOJXKqONLmhdobcz.name: Luck

tXXoVYBeWOjbmzsCI.name: Magic Resistance
tXXoVYBeWOjbmzsCI.notes: -1/level to skill for others to cast a spell on you. +1/level to resist spells.

tHfoGrDcwG1TzQi_c.name: Single-Minded
tHfoGrDcwG1TzQi_c.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

tyLGYZ3zggkkSWBsE.name: Unfazeable
tyLGYZ3zggkkSWBsE.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

tmxZ3_1ogPGqthwb_.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)
tmxZ3_1ogPGqthwb_.name: Combat Reflexes

tLSAab-sQ0Xtxm-6p.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat
tLSAab-sQ0Xtxm-6p.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

toLlLrqA1HV6fPP4q.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!
toLlLrqA1HV6fPP4q.name: Overconfidence

tm0wXEREddTUKDx5p.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks
tm0wXEREddTUKDx5p.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)

tQSSXXgoadTEOiYme.name: Impulsiveness
tQSSXXgoadTEOiYme.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

tbnYf3wRsXkSjfBfv.name: Loner
tbnYf3wRsXkSjfBfv.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

tD2cG09-b3Kh8uWSf.name: Trickster
tD2cG09-b3Kh8uWSf.notes: Make a self-control roll each day. If you fail, you must try to trick a dangerous subject: a skilled warrior, a dangerous monster, a whole group of reasonably competent opponents, etc. If you resist, you get a cumulative -1 per day to your self-control roll until you finally fail a roll!

tbBVCQ7ArsF3zQnWC.notes: Double the shock from any injury. You roll at -4 to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.
tbBVCQ7ArsF3zQnWC.name: Low Pain Threshold

taYnA7UYPZ_Pk0ur9.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!
taYnA7UYPZ_Pk0ur9.name: Honesty

tl3PXfy9NvQJfAPpK.notes: Make a self-control roll in any situation where you could render aid or are specifically asked for help, but should resist the urge
tl3PXfy9NvQJfAPpK.name: Charitable

tZeXhsBCGDVOTa_qQ.name: Severe Shyness
tZeXhsBCGDVOTa_qQ.notes: You are very uncomfortable around strangers, and tend to be quiet even among friends.

tvrJj2uEWrbcHcAlj.notes: Gives others +4 on all Empathy, Body Language, and Psychology rolls to discern your intentions or the truth of your words. They also get +4 to their IQ, Detect Lies, and Gambling rolls in any Quick Contest with your Acting, Fast-Talk, or Gambling skill when you try to lie or bluff.
tvrJj2uEWrbcHcAlj.name: Easy to Read

tasFlwl9vipxX5y7n.name: Mild Shyness
tasFlwl9vipxX5y7n.notes: You are uneasy with strangers, especially assertive or attractive ones.

tbweoYJV0CeY3Wrnh.name: Absent-Mindedness
tbweoYJV0CeY3Wrnh.notes: -5 on all IQ and IQ-based skill rolls, save those for the task you are currently concentrating on. Once adrift in your own thoughts, you must roll against Perception-5 in order to notice any event short of personal physical injury.

tk6-WCou4IUDU9hMG.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.
tk6-WCou4IUDU9hMG.name: Gluttony

tUG40qM_W-Vq2bISL.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.
tUG40qM_W-Vq2bISL.name: Greed

tu6a936U1vHQRam4F.name: Post-Combat Shakes
tu6a936U1vHQRam4F.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

sLmV0BdWQ9GbKEgSF.name: 2 more points in a Know Thy Enemy skill

SqQh8Da4NdX8uoEtS.name: One at 8 points, two at 4 points, the rest at 1 point
